var log=console.log;export var setActiveUser=function setActiveUser(app,user){app.setState({activeUser:user});};export var onLogin=function onLogin(landingPage,email,password){var authKey=_getUserHash(email,password);var user=getUserByAuthKey(landingPage,authKey);// check login attempt
if(user===null){landingPage.setState({invalidLogin:true});}else{landingPage.setState({userEmail:email,userPassword:password,invalidLogin:false});landingPage.props.setActiveUserHandler(user);}};export var _getUserHash=function _getUserHash(email,password){return email+password;};export var getUserByAuthKey=function getUserByAuthKey(ctx,authKey){var userId=ctx.state.loginUserIdMap[authKey];if(userId===undefined){log("Invalid aogin attempt. Try again");return null;}log("Successful login");return getUserById(ctx,userId);};export var getUserById=function getUserById(ctx,id){return ctx.state.users[id];};
